data.name: Battle royale simulator Demo
data.detailed_description: Battle royale simulator lets you simulate and control a battle royale game. You can choose the amount of player (like 600 at max), game speed, air drops, where the storm will close and just some really cool things
data.about_the_game: Battle royale simulator lets you simulate and control a battle royale game. You can choose the amount of player (like 600 at max), game speed, air drops, where the storm will close and just some really cool things
data.short_description: Battle royale simulator lets you simulate and control a battle royale game. You can choose the amount of player (like 600 at max), game speed, air drops, where the storm will close and just some really cool...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 32-bit
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 32-bit
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
